name: Notion aesthetic beginners pack
description: Introducing the ultimate starter pack for anyone looking to dive into the world of NotionThe Notion Beginners Pack! With seven specially designed templates to help you get started using Notion.Whether you're a student, entrepreneur, or someone who loves to stay organized, the Notion aesthetic Beginners Pack has everything you need to get started.With templates for task management, note-taking, project planning, habit tracking, and more, you'll be amazed at how much more productive you can be wit
features: sticky notes; Book reading hub; Personal aesthetic hub; projects and tasks manager; Daily/weekly reflections journal; Simple Goals and practices dashboard; Content management system + formats
